line: ah agent p our sources tell us that the r2 unit is safely in the possession of obi-wan kenobi. you always come through for us. agent p i've got your next mission. you need to get to the death star immediately. darthenshmirtz is working on a new inator. we need you to stop him before he can finish building it. good luck.
